name: Animated Infinity Symbol
description:
This animation started as a challenge received from @MrBiscuit to get smooth elliptical rotation. Later on, he showed me that @g (Gleb) found a way to achieve multiple rotations by rotating nested frames.


Later on @MrBiscuit tweeted the Fourier series. A short time after that, I discovered delayed steps.


This animation combines all of the above into a single one.
